content:
{"name": "Dublin Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* You can come once a month for a full shop and once a month for produce (going forward it will be produce only.
* We will give out random numbers close to our start time to determine the order in which people shop (lottery system). We will no longer be first come first served.
* Customers coming in after the lottery will be given a number as they enter the building.
You will still need a photo ID and proof of address.
* If it’s your first visit of the month we will give you a blue number tag for a full shop. We will also give you a ticket that lets you know how much of each item you can take.
* If you’ve already visited the pantry this month we will give you a green number tag for produce.
* Only one person from your family can go into the shopping area. For safety reasons children are not allowed in the shopping area (except the produce only area).
* If you are a proxy picking up food for someone else you can only shop for one family at a time.
* Please bring your own reusable shopping bags. As many grocers are no longer giving out bags anymore, we don’t have enough.
* First week of the month is very busy. Come later in the month for faster service.
* If you see any ways we can improve as we make this change, please let us know.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.dublinfoodpantry.org/get-help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6608 Dublin Center Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Dublin", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43017", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.1029259, "longitude": -83.093215}, "phones": [{"number": "(614) 889-6590", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "21:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Get a number/ticket"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
